mapper.sql: id, uid, orderid, price, finalprice, addressid, cid, status, createtime, closetime, paytime, courier, company, sendtime, recievetime
mapper.select:
select
from orders
orderid like "%"#{orderid}"%"
status = #{status}
mapper.insert: insert into orders (id, uid, orderid, price, finalprice, addressid, cid, status, createtime, closetime, paytime, courier, company, sendtime, recievetime ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{finalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{courier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recievetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
